item.title: Musk to slow down political spending: 'I think I've done enough'
item.description: The billionaire executive was Trump's biggest donor in 2024. Now, however, he is planning to cut back his spending on politics, he said on Tuesday.

item.title: The world now has its first ever pandemic treaty. Will it make a difference?
item.description: At the World Health Assembly, 193 members nations voted to adopt a treat calling for better preventive measures and global cooperation. But there are ...

item.title: New studies show what's at stake if Medicaid is scaled back
item.description: Researchers studied the health care program's effect on the health of millions of Americans and found tens of thousands of lives were saved.

item.title: In 'Original Sin,' Jake Tapper describes a 'cover-up' of Joe Biden's decline
item.description: Tapper's book, co-authored by Alex Thompson, describes a president who struggled to function: "One person told us that the presidency was, at best, a ...

item.title: Home Depot doesn't plan to raise prices due to tariffs. But some items may disappear
